description: Deletes an existing snapshot. When you receive a successful response from this operation, MemoryDB immediately begins deleting the snapshot; you cannot cancel or revert this operation.

parameters.name: SnapshotName
parameters.description: The name of the snapshot to delete.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the snapshot. Valid values: creating | available | restoring | copying | deleting.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the snapshot is from an automatic backup (automated) or was created manually (manual).

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key used to encrypt the snapshot.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: ClusterConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the cluster from which the snapshot was taken.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the cluster.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the cluster configuration.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: The node type used for the cluster.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The name of the engine used by the cluster configuration.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The Redis OSS engine version used by the cluster.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceWindow
nested_items.description: The specified maintenance window for the cluster.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SNS notification topic for the cluster.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port used by the cluster.

nested_items.name: ParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of parameter group used by the cluster.

nested_items.name: SubnetGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the subnet group used by the cluster.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC the cluster belongs to.

nested_items.name: SnapshotRetentionLimit
nested_items.description: The snapshot retention limit set by the cluster.

nested_items.name: SnapshotWindow
nested_items.description: The snapshot window set by the cluster.

nested_items.name: NumShards
nested_items.description: The number of shards in the cluster.

nested_items.name: Shards
nested_items.description: The list of shards in the cluster.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the shard.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: The configuration details of the shard.

nested_items.name: Slots
nested_items.description: A string that specifies the keyspace for a particular node group. Keyspaces range from 0 to 16,383. The string is in the format startkey-endkey.

nested_items.name: ReplicaCount
nested_items.description: The number of read replica nodes in this shard.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of the shard's snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotCreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the shard's snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: MultiRegionParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the multi-Region parameter group associated with the cluster configuration.

nested_items.name: MultiRegionClusterName
nested_items.description: The name for the multi-Region cluster associated with the cluster configuration.

nested_items.name: DataTiering
nested_items.description: Enables data tiering. Data tiering is only supported for clusters using the r6gd node type. This parameter must be set when using r6gd nodes. For more information, see Data tiering.
